Name: Monolight
About the game: MONOLIGHT is 2D plat-former puzzle adventure game. You need to start a journey in other to save the last blac. You only have a tiny lantern. but, if you find the right way in the maze, you can approach the top of cattle at the end of the world. while you go through the banish world, you can meet so many other things and hear stories about the history of war. Figure out true and save the last blac. comment of the developer: This game is two university students' practice project. So, the game can have some incomplete components and can have a slow update. Just thanks for playing.
